metadata.title: CVE-2023-41910 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in lldpd before 1.0.17. By crafting a CDP PDUpacket with specific CDP_TLV_ADDRESSES TLVs, a malicious actor can remotelyforce the lldpd daemon to perform an out-of-bounds read on heap memory.This occurs in cdp_decode in daemon/protocols/cdp.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41910` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lldpd - 1.0.17-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lldpd package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.17-1').
